catalog_script_client.name: onLoad - Set Defaults

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="LAN WAN Service Request (STS01)">d81ebf241bf93110824752c1604bcb74</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onLoad - Set Defaults</name><order/><script><![CDATA[   var ga = new GlideAjax('x_g_sonc_ns_pro.sys_user_ajax');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUser');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_user_id', g_user.userID);
   ga.getXMLAnswer(getUser);

   function getUser(response) {

       alert(response);

       var user = JSON.parse(response);

       alert(user.phone + ' : ' + user.email);

       g_form.setValue('requestor_phone', user.phone);
       g_form.setValue('requestor_email', user.email);

   }]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-09 19:22:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8cc04b591b39f910824752c1604bcb85</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onLoad - Set Defaults</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8cc04b591b39f910824752c1604bcb85</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 06:39:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
